resources.string: Select the option that corresponds how often you have been bothered by the following over the past two weeks.
In the past two weeks, how often did you feel nervous, anxious, or on edge?
In the past two weeks, how often were you not able to stop or control worrying?
In the past two weeks, how often were you worrying too much about different things?
In the past two weeks, how often did you have trouble relaxing?
In the past two weeks, how often were you so restless that it was hard to sit still?
In the past two weeks, how often were you becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
In the past two weeks, how often were you feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
In the past two weeks, how often did you feel little interest or pleasure in doing things?
In the past two weeks, how often were you feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
In the past two weeks, how often did you have trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
In the past two weeks, how often were you feeling tired or having little energy?
In the past two weeks, how often did you have poor appetite or overeating?
In the past two weeks, how often were you feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
In the past two weeks, how often did you have trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
In the past two weeks, how often were you moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or so fidgety or restless that you have been moving a lot more than usual?
In the past two weeks, how often have you had thoughts that you would be better off dead, or thoughts of hurting yourself in some way?
This app is for use by healthcare professional only. \n \nThe first seven questions are the GAD-7 anxiety screener, the following nine are the PHQ-9 depression screener test.
I am a healthcare professional\nadministering this test to a patient
You are administering the GAD-7 and PHQ-9 anxiety and depression screener tests.
This is filler text for sentence about this long.
